summary: A young man inherits a nearly bankrupt funeral home from his estranged father. He falls in love with the alluring young mortician, only to find out she's offing people to keep the place in business!
cast: Jay Baruchel|Sergio Di Zio|Nigel Bennett|Thomas Gibson|Reagan Pasternak|Slavko Negulic|Graham Greene|Rose Byrne|Jeremy Akerman|Craig Wood|Gay Hauser|Brian Downey|Martha Irving|Bill Wood|Leah Randell|Loretta Yu|Megan Edwards|Christopher Shore|Michael Pellerin|Don Bottomley|Michael Ray Fox
title: Just Buried
